DOC.brief_summary: Fibromyalgia rheumatologic syndrome characterize widespread chronic pain , tender point symptom fatigue , sleep disturbance , anxiety depression . Therapeutic exercise describe important form management symptom . This study aim ass strengthen stretch exercise efficacy symptom quality life Fibromyalgia patient . The study do General Clinical Hospital Medicine Scholl University Sao Paulo . 63 subject undergo study divide three group : 1 strengthen exercise , 2 stretch exercise 3 control group . Patients evaluate follow instrument : Fibromyalgia Impact Questionnaire , Medical Outcomes Study 36-item Short-Form Health Survey ( SF-36 ) , Stanford Health Assessment Questionnaire , dolorimetry tender point Fischer dolorimeter , finger-to-tip floor test muscular flexibility , dynamometer EMG System Brasil strength test extension flexion knee elbow , time get go test , functional reach test , sit-to-stand test . Subjects 1 strengthen exercise group undergo global strengthen program 2 stretch exercise group undergo global stretching program . All program 12 week duration physical therapy twice week . The control group intervention 12 week second evaluation enter common program physical therapy . Data analyze descriptive interferential statistic procedure .
DOC.detailed_description: In study , include subject fibromyalgia diagnosis age 30 55 year old . We aim assess effect physical therapy program impact fibromyalgia syndrome quality life .
DOC.criteria: Fibromyalgia diagnosis accord American Rheumatology Criteria Aged 30 55 year old Severe rheumatologic syndrome neurologic syndrome
